author: Paul Kasabian
title: John Lynch: 'No Excuses, No Explanations' for 49ers with Remote 2020 NFL Draft
description: The 2020  NFL  draft will go on as planned in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic, although the selection process  will not be held  in Las Vegas as previously scheduled...
content:
Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images
The 2020 NFL draft will go on as planned in the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic, although the selection process will not be held in Las Vegas as previously scheduled. 
The pre-draft preparation period has also been radically altered… [+1891 chars]
